title: Whatâ€™s the Outlook for the US Stock Market in 2020?
description: David Kostin, chief US equity strategist for Goldman Sachs Research, discusses his team's forecasts for US stocks in the year ahead. But before that, Tony Pasquariello, global head of hedge fund coverage for Goldman Sachs Securities Division, walks through the five numbers he's watching in markets.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:subtitle: A Conversation with Goldman Sachs' David Kostin and Tony Pasquariello
